Management

Visionary data scientists. Accomplished industry veterans. Trusted advisors. Provden investors. SpartanWare is led by world-class team that believes in data's potential to change the world. SpartanWare is proud to be backed by Intel Capital, Investor Growth Capital, QuestMark Partners, Goldman Sachhs, Translink Capital and other strategic investors. Presenting the Executive Team to you!

Management

Rashi Agrawal

CEO, SpartanWare

She is a goal-oriented Software Engineer with over 3 years experience in building and testing software applications ranging from complex ERP systems to new generation Cloud based technologies. With multilingual (English, French and Spanish) proficiency and effective communication skills, she has proven ability to work with teams across geographic locations.
